actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect on the length of the term of office of the President and Vice President and the number of terms a President may serve.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that the President and Vice President of the United States shall hold such office for a single term of six years. Makes such article applicable to Presidents and Vice Presidents elected after the date on which this article is ratified.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States with respect on the length of the term of office of the President and Vice President and the number of terms a President may serve.
